member.name: T:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase
member.summary: Represents the base of all DER objects in the DataEncoding library.

member.name: P:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the of the DER object.

member.name: P:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the of the DER object's value.

member.name: P:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.Encoded
member.summary: Gets or sets the value. (Obtained after calling either or method).

member.name: M:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.Encode
member.summary:
Encodes the value currently stored inside the DER object into a DER byte array.
Also sets the value of the object.
member.returns: The encoded byte array.

member.name: M:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.Decode(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary:
Decodes the given byte array into a value and sets it as Content to the given object.
Also sets the , and values.
member.param: An index in the encoded array from which the object starts.
member.returns: The amount of bytes used from the input during the decoding process (i.e. the total length of the T-L-V structure).

member.name: M:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.EncodeLength(System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the given length into a byte array that represents that length according to the DER standard.
member.returns: The byte array that represents the given length according to the DER standard.

member.name: M:DataEncoding.DER.DERBase.DecodeLength(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary:
Decodes the length of a the value field from the given encoded data.
Note: The entire encoded byte array that's relevant to the given object must be passed to the method.
Throws a when the length of the length field takes more than 5 bytes. (i.e. The value field takes up more than 2^32 bytes)
member.param: The encoded byte array that represents the DER encoded object.
The index in encoded array at which the length field starts.
member.returns:
An array of :
Index 0 - The length of the value field.
Index 1 - The total length of the length field.

member.name: T:DataEncoding.DER.DERGeneric
member.summary: Represents a generic DER object.

member.name: P:DataEncoding.DER.DERGeneric.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the of the DER object. When the is set, the is automatically adjusted.

member.name: T:DataEncoding.DER.DERSequence
member.summary:
Represents a DER Sequence.
Note: The DER sequence does not have the value available until either of or method is called.

member.summary: Decodes the given JSON data and sets object's properties based on the decoded data.

member.name: M:DataEncoding.JSON.JSONBase.GetDatatype(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the datatype of the first detected data and returns a new JSON object accordingly to that datatype.
member.param: The JSON string in which to search for data.
The index from which to start the search.
member.returns: A JSON object that represents the detected datatype.

member.name: T:DataEncoding.JSON.JSONDecoder
member.summary:
Provides an easy way to decode JSON strings with multiple data
(i.e. JSON strings that have more than 1 object or don't have data contained in an object)

member.summary: Decodes the given JSON-encoded string.
member.param: The index from which to start decoding.
member.returns: A list of any detected data in the JSON string.
